title: Conditional Online Learning Program for [Large-Scale] Electrocardiogram (ECG) Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of electrocardiography (ECG) theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous educational course for current medical practitioners conducted via a smartphone-based LMS (Learning Management System).

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish normal/abnormal ECG waveforms with 85% accuracy.
Learners complete tasks meeting Gagné’s four conditions (information presentation, performance elicitation, feedback provision, learning assessment) at least three times.
Learners can derive clinical judgments with over 90% reliability through complex ECG case analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
